derivation.yuyuan_name: from Urdu and Persian ŝāl, probably from Shāliāt, the name of a town in India

entry.def: A shawl is a large piece of woollen cloth which a woman wears over her shoulders or head, or which is wrapped around a baby to keep it warm.

means.word_mean: 1. cloak consisting of an oblong piece of cloth used to cover the head and shoulders
